turns.content: Write me a short product description for a paper towel, 1 layered, 20cm wide, it is 300m / roll, and the product is a whole package. a package includes 6 roll.

Introducing our premium one-layered paper towel, perfect for all your cleaning and wiping needs. Each roll is 20cm wide and 300m long, providing you with plenty of paper to tackle any mess. Each package includes six rolls, so you'll have a steady supply on hand. Our paper towel is absorbent, durable, and easy to use, making it a great addition to any home or office. Don't settle for less, choose our top-of-the-line paper towel for all your cleaning needs.
It is for car detailer garages mostly, rewrite the "great addition to any home or office"

Our premium one-layered paper towel is a must-have for any car detailing garage. Each roll is 20cm wide and 300m long, providing you with plenty of paper to tackle any mess. Each package includes six rolls, so you'll have a steady supply on hand. Our paper towel is absorbent, durable, and easy to use, making it perfect for wiping down cars and cleaning up spills. Don't settle for less, choose our top-of-the-line paper towel for all your car detailing needs.
no we don't wipe cars with this, that's not allowed

Our premium one-layered paper towel is a must-have for any car detailing garage. Each roll is 20cm wide and 300m long, providing you with plenty of paper to tackle any mess. Each package includes six rolls, so you'll have a steady supply on hand. Our paper towel is absorbent, durable, and easy to use, making it perfect for cleaning and drying surfaces in your garage. Don't settle for less, choose our top-of-the-line paper towel for all your car detailing needs.
now translate it to german

Unser Premium-Einlagentuch ist ein Muss für jede Autopflegegarage. Jeder Rollen ist 20 cm breit und 300 m lang, so dass Sie genügend Papier haben, um jede Verschmutzung zu beseitigen. Jede Verpackung enthält sechs Rollen, damit Sie immer einen ausreichenden Vorrat haben. Unser Papiertuch ist saugfähig, langlebig und einfach zu verwenden, was es perfekt für die Reinigung und Trocknung von Oberflächen in Ihrer Garage macht. Verzichten Sie nicht auf weniger, wählen Sie unser hochwertiges Papiertuch für alle Ihre Autopflegebedürfnisse.
now write a product title for this in german
"Premium Einlagentuch für die Autopflegegarage - 6 Rollen im Paket"
shorter, leave premium
"Einlagentuch für Autopflegegarage - 6 Rollen im Paket"
rewrite the product description, it's 20cm high, not wide

Jede Verpackung enthält sechs Rollen, damit Sie immer einen ausreichenden Vorrat haben. Unser Papiertuch ist saugfähig, langlebig und einfach zu verwenden, was es perfekt für die Reinigung und Trocknung von Oberflächen in Ihrer Garage macht.
